duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet clients and their pets and complete the appointment sign-in process.
Assist clients with check-out, ensuring services and product sales are correctly accounted.
Answer phone calls from clients and make outbound phone calls to remind clients of upcoming appointments.
Understand common vaccination protocols, basic lab tests, common diseases, veterinary terminology, and pet behavior.
Assist in cleanliness and maintenance of the hospital to ensure a great client experience.

education_certification.credential: 1+ years of front desk experience, medical or veterinary field preferred
